attributes.action: Allow spouses and civil partners to have a joint Inheritance Tax 'threshold'.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many couples have made arrangements to make full use of both tax thresholds by for example making their homes Tenancy in Common and setting up Will trusts.  This could be avoided by allowing them to 'leave' the threashold of the first to die to the survivor.  It would take most homeowners out of the IHT bracket.  It should apply retrospectively.
